articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: “Unacceptable”: Spotify bricking Car Thing devices in Dec. without refunds - Ars Technica
articles.description: Spotify stopped making Car Things in July 2022 but kept selling them.
articles.content:
100
Owners of Spotify's soon-to-be-bricked Car Thing device are begging the company to open-source the gadgets to save some the landfill. Spotify hasn't responded to pleas to salvage the hardware, w… [+4724 chars]

articles.author: Christine Hall
articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Remark, offering shopping decision software, puts thousands of human product experts into AI form - TechCrunch
articles.description: Remark trains AI models on human product experts that can answer questions with the same style of their human counterparts.
articles.content:
Shopping is fun, but making a decision on one set of skis among thousands of possibilities is not. Thats where Remark comes in.
The two-year-old startup is helping shoppers buy with more confidence,… [+3649 chars]
